Additional Scope Comments: Non-capstone accounts will be managed according to disposition instructions outlined in GRS6.1 item 011. Emails will be destroyed within the USADF electronic recording-keeping system at the appropriate time.
Cutoff Instructions: Cutoff will be the end of the employee's tenure.
Transfer Instructions: Agency's Capstone designated employees' emails will be transferred to NARA when 15 years old.
Legacy Email Scope: USADF will include legacy emails dating back to 2013.

Additional Scope Comments: Item 010 - cut off at the end of tenure.Item 011 - will be applied to all positions not listed below as Capstone Accounts.Since the NSA/CSS Director is also the Commander, U.S. Cyber Command, the scope includes email records created/received by the Commander, U.S. Cyber Command. The Records Group for U.S. Cyber Command is 218.The majority of positions have three accounts (high, medium, low).
Legacy Email Scope: A traditional records management approach with a print-to-file policy was enforced prior to Capstone adoption, as well as use of other disposition authorities to capture email. Some legacy email, however, exists; the scope of legacy email varies by position with the earliest date being 1999.

Name of Agency to Which this Form Applie: Department of Energy, National Nuclear Security Administration
Additional Scope Comments: The National Nuclear Security Administration (NNSA) is a semi-autonomous agency under the US Department of Energy and will submit a separate NA-1005 with the NNSA Administrator identified in Category 1.  NNSA will use Schedule Items 010 and 011 but will not use Item 012.  NNSA does not have enough positions that would fall under Item 012 to warrant use of the three year retention.
Legacy Email Scope: Email capture will be "point-forward" upon approval of this NA-1005 by NARA.  Estimated implementation date 01/01/2017.  The legacy process for email was print-to-file and will be in place until full Capstone implementation.
URL to Agency Organization Chart: An organization chart depicting the NNSA organization and management structure is not available on-line.  A file is attached to this form which defines the organization and management structure as well as the position functions identified as Capstone Officials.
